title: When You Run Away From Xerath's Ult With 2 HP Left

replies.body:
Nub Xerath never aims ahead ;P

Seriously though, low health enemies either die in one shot or dodge them all...

It's so fun when u pop your ult as Xerath and they start running left while u watch and smile at the cute little Lee ward hoping and trying to juke your shots and then he flashes in one of your hits and dies:). Well at least this is what happened   a day ago in one of my games.
